name: inlinemath
description: Shows lightweight math overlays for Java code (starting with division).

inlinemath.division.codeLens.description: Show a CodeLens above simple divisions like a/b.

inlinemath.division.peekDefinition.description: Enable Peek Definition for divisions (opens a virtual stacked fraction view).

inlinemath.preview.enabled.description: Enable the KaTeX-based Math Preview webview.

inlinemath.preview.scale.description: Scale factor for KaTeX rendering in Math Preview (1.0 = normal, 1.5 = 50% bigger).

inlinemath.division.inlineDecoration.description: Show an inline (after) decoration for simple divisions like a/b.

inlinemath.division.hoverStackedFraction.description: Show a stacked two-line fraction in hover for simple divisions like a/b.

inlinemath.division.inlinePrefix.description: Prefix shown before the inline fraction decoration.

inlinemath.expression.codeLens.description: Show CodeLens entries for simple expressions using +, -, *, / and grouping with () or {}.

inlinemath.expression.inlineDecoration.description: Show an inline (after) decoration for expressions (e.g., a+b*c).

inlinemath.expression.hoverLatex.description: Show a hover with a lightweight preview and LaTeX for expressions.

inlinemath.expression.inlinePrefix.description: Prefix shown before the inline expression decoration.

inlinemath.pow.codeLens.description: Show CodeLens entries for qualified Math.pow(base, exp) calls (rendered as exponentiation).

inlinemath.pow.inlineDecoration.description: Show an inline (after) decoration for qualified Math.pow(base, exp) calls.

inlinemath.pow.hoverLatex.description: Show a hover with a lightweight preview and LaTeX for qualified Math.pow(base, exp) calls.

inlinemath.pow.inlinePrefix.description: Prefix shown before the inline Math.pow decoration.

inlinemath.sum.codeLens.description: Show CodeLens entries for simple for-loop summations (rendered as a Σ summation).

inlinemath.sum.inlineDecoration.description: Show an inline (after) decoration for detected for-loop summations.

inlinemath.sum.hoverLatex.description: Show a hover with a lightweight preview and LaTeX for detected for-loop summations.

inlinemath.sum.inlinePrefix.description: Prefix shown before the inline summation decoration.

inlinemath.map.codeLens.description: Show CodeLens entries for simple for-loops that assign to an indexed output (e.g. answer[i] = f(i)).

inlinemath.map.inlineDecoration.description: Show an inline (after) decoration for detected indexed assignments in for-loops.

inlinemath.map.hoverLatex.description: Show a hover with a lightweight preview and LaTeX for detected indexed assignments in for-loops.

inlinemath.map.inlinePrefix.description: Prefix shown before the inline indexed-assignment decoration.
